divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way home, about 11:45 pm, after attending an outstate (non-UFO) event. I was only about five minutes from home, traveling north, in a residential area, when I noticed a very bright light approaching from a northeasterly direction. It caught my eye because it seemed much brighter than an airplane, and it was obviously not a planet (too big and too close). Only a minute or two later, it was suddenly on my right, moving soundlessly and very slowly, at almost eye level as I bent down slightly to watch it out of my righthand window. It was much, much too low, and moving too slowly, to be a plane coming in for a landing; Rockford's airport is on the very southern edge of town, and I was in the northern part of town. I continued on for a few seconds before the enormity of what had happened sank in and then I pulled over, stopped and looked out my rear window to see if I could still see it, but it was gone. It all happened very quickly, but it was unmistakably a UFO. It was black, a triangle shape, with bright white lights on the underside. There were no red lights or blinking lights. My mind was very still and I experienced no fear, but afterwards I had the strange feeling that it was there at that moment on purpose, wanting me to see it. My car experienced no electrical effects that I am aware of (I did not have my radio on) during or after the experience, but I felt a heightened sensation within myself. My feeling is that it was very benevolent.
Summary: Black, triangular object with white lights on the bottom, low in the sky, moving slowly with no sound
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Rockford
There were no other sightings in Rockford on or around October 29th 2007
